name: Through the Depths
description:
EXTRA MEDIA:

Hold a specific letter in this site's name, https://www.reddit.com/, on the main menu or pause screen for a special feature. There is only one letter from this site's name that can activate this special feature.

You found yourself in the depths of deep water. The only way out is though the dark and dangerous passage. Find you way between deadly obstacles.

A short game made for the #ExtraCreditGameJam5

How to play
W / A / S / D - up / left / down / right
Space - slow down
ESC - pause
